nrqlQueries.query: SELECT cardinality(zookeeper_status_quorumsize) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW
SELECT average(zookeeper_inmemorydatatree_nodecount) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW
SELECT (average(zookeeper_numaliveconnections) * cardinality(zookeeper_numaliveconnections)) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW
SELECT (average(zookeeper_inmemorydatatree_watchcount) * cardinality(zookeeper_inmemorydatatree_watchcount)) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW
SELECT (average(zookeeper_outstandingrequests) * cardinality(zookeeper_outstandingrequests)) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW

SELECT ifthen((latest(kafka_controller_kafkacontroller_activecontrollercount) > 0), latest(kafka_controller_kafkacontroller_activecontrollercount)) FROM Metric WHERE (getfield(kafka_controller_kafkacontroller_activecontrollercount, latest) > 0) SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET targetName LIMIT 100
SELECT cardinality(kafka_server_replicamanager_leadercount) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW
SELECT average(kafka_server_replicamanager_partitioncount) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW
SELECT average(kafka_server_replicamanager_underreplicatedpartitions) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW
SELECT average(kafka_cluster_partition_underminisr) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW
SELECT average(kafka_controller_kafkacontroller_offlinepartitionscount) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW
SELECT cardinality(kafka_schema_registry_registered_count) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW
SELECT (average(kafka_schema_registry_registered_count) * cardinality(kafka_schema_registry_registered_count)) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW
SELECT (average(kafka_schema_registry_schemas_deleted) * cardinality(kafka_schema_registry_schemas_deleted)) as ''FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW
SELECT cardinality(kafka_connect_connect_worker_metrics_connector_count) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW

SELECT (average(kafka_connect_connect_worker_metrics_connector_total_task_count) * cardinality(kafka_connect_connect_worker_metrics_connector_total_task_count)) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW

SELECT (average(kafka_connect_connect_worker_metrics_connector_running_task_count) * cardinality(kafka_connect_connect_worker_metrics_connector_running_task_count)) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW

SELECT (average(kafka_connect_connect_worker_metrics_connector_paused_task_count) * cardinality(kafka_connect_connect_worker_metrics_connector_paused_task_count)) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW

SELECT (average(kafka_connect_connect_worker_metrics_connector_failed_task_count) * cardinality(kafka_connect_connect_worker_metrics_connector_failed_task_count)) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW
SELECT latest(kafka_connect_connect_worker_rebalance_metrics_time_since_last_rebalance_ms) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW LIMIT 100
SELECT cardinality(ksql_ksql_engine_query_stats_num_active_queries) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW
SELECT average(ksql_ksql_engine_query_stats_num_active_queries) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW
SELECT average(ksql_ksql_engine_query_stats_running_queries) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW
SELECT (average(ksql_ksql_engine_query_stats_rebalancing_queries) * cardinality(ksql_ksql_engine_query_stats_rebalancing_queries)) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW
SELECT average(ksql_ksql_engine_query_stats_error_queries) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW
SELECT (average(ksql_ksql_engine_query_stats_not_running_queries) * cardinality(ksql_ksql_engine_query_stats_not_running_queries)) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW

SELECT ifthen((latest(kafka_controller_kafkacontroller_activecontrollercount) > 0), latest(kafka_controller_kafkacontroller_activecontrollercount)) FROM Metric WHERE (getfield(kafka_controller_kafkacontroller_activecontrollercount, latest) > 0) SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET targetName LIMIT 100
SELECT cardinality(kafka_server_replicamanager_leadercount) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW
SELECT (average(kafka_server_replicamanager_partitioncount) * cardinality(kafka_server_replicamanager_partitioncount)) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW
SELECT (average(kafka_server_replicamanager_underreplicatedpartitions) * cardinality(kafka_server_replicamanager_underreplicatedpartitions)) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW
SELECT (average(kafka_controller_kafkacontroller_offlinepartitionscount) * cardinality(kafka_controller_kafkacontroller_offlinepartitionscount)) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW
SELECT average(kafka_cluster_partition_underminisr) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW
SELECT average(kafka_controller_kafkacontroller_preferredreplicaimbalancecount) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW

SELECT (average(kafka_controller_controllerstats_uncleanleaderelectionspersec) * cardinality(kafka_controller_controllerstats_uncleanleaderelectionspersec)) as '' FROM Metric SINCE 1 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW
SELECT latest(kafka_server_brokertopicmetrics_bytesinpersec),latest(kafka_server_brokertopicmetrics_bytesoutpersec) FROM Metric SINCE 30 minutes ago TIMESERIES
SELECT latest(kafka_network_requestmetrics_requestspersec) FROM Metric SINCE 30 minutes ago TIMESERIES facet request
SELECT latest(kafka_network_requestmetrics_errors_total) FROM Metric SINCE 30 minutes ago TIMESERIES
SELECT (irate(process_cpu_seconds_total, 1 SECONDS) * 100) FROM Metric SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 300000 SLIDE BY 30000 where scrapedTargetName like 'kafka%' facet targetName

SELECT (average(jvm_memory_bytes_used) * cardinality(jvm_memory_bytes_used)) FROM Metric SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET dimensions(exclude: {'area'}) LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000 where scrapedTargetName like 'kafka%'
SELECT average(jvm_memory_bytes_max) FROM Metric SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET dimensions(exclude: {'area'}) LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000 where scrapedTargetName like 'kafka%'
SELECT latest(jvm_gc_collection_seconds_sum) FROM Metric SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET dimensions() LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000
SELECT sum(kafka_server_brokertopicmetrics_messagesinpersec) FROM Metric SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET scrapedTargetName LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 300000 SLIDE BY 30000
SELECT rate(sum(kafka_server_brokertopicmetrics_bytesinpersec), 1 SECONDS) FROM Metric SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET scrapedTargetName LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 300000 SLIDE BY 30000
SELECT rate(sum(kafka_server_brokertopicmetrics_bytesoutpersec), 1 SECONDS) FROM Metric SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET scrapedTargetName LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 300000 SLIDE BY 30000
SELECT (1 - latest(kafka_network_socketserver_networkprocessoravgidlepercent)) FROM Metric SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET scrapedTargetName LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000
SELECT (1 - latest(kafka_server_kafkarequesthandlerpool_requesthandleravgidlepercent_total)) FROM Metric SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET scrapedTargetName LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000
SELECT latest(kafka_server_zookeeperclientmetrics_zookeeperrequestlatencyms) FROM Metric SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET scrapedTargetName  LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000
SELECT latest(kafka_server_sessionexpirelistener_zookeepersyncconnectspersec) FROM Metric SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET scrapedTargetName LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000
SELECT latest(kafka_server_sessionexpirelistener_zookeeperexpirespersec) FROM Metric SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET scrapedTargetName LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000
SELECT latest(kafka_server_sessionexpirelistener_zookeeperdisconnectspersec) FROM Metric SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET scrapedTargetName LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000
SELECT latest(kafka_server_sessionexpirelistener_zookeeperauthfailurespersec) FROM Metric SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET scrapedTargetName LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000
SELECT (average(kafka_log_log_size) * cardinality(kafka_log_log_size)) FROM Metric SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW TIMESERIES 30000 facet scrapedTargetName
SELECT (average(kafka_log_log_size) * cardinality(kafka_log_log_size)) FROM Metric SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET topic LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000
SELECT latest(kafka_server_replicamanager_isrshrinkspersec) FROM Metric SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET dimensions() LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000
SELECT latest(kafka_server_replicamanager_isrexpandspersec) FROM Metric SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET dimensions() LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000
SELECT latest(kafka_network_requestmetrics_requestqueuetimems) FROM Metric WHERE (request = 'Produce') SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET scrapedTargetName LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000
SELECT latest(kafka_network_requestmetrics_localtimems) FROM Metric WHERE (request = 'Produce') SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET scrapedTargetName LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000
SELECT latest(kafka_network_requestmetrics_remotetimems) FROM Metric WHERE (request = 'Produce') SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET scrapedTargetName LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000
SELECT latest(kafka_network_requestmetrics_responsequeuetimems) FROM Metric WHERE (request = 'Produce') SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET scrapedTargetName LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000
SELECT latest(kafka_network_requestmetrics_responsesendtimems) FROM Metric WHERE (request = 'Produce') SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET scrapedTargetName LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000
SELECT latest(kafka_network_requestmetrics_requestqueuetimems) FROM Metric WHERE (request = 'Fetch') SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET scrapedTargetName LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000
SELECT latest(kafka_network_requestmetrics_localtimems) FROM Metric WHERE (request = 'Fetch') SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET scrapedTargetName LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000
SELECT latest(kafka_network_requestmetrics_remotetimems) FROM Metric WHERE (request = 'Fetch') SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET scrapedTargetName LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000
SELECT latest(kafka_network_requestmetrics_responsequeuetimems) FROM Metric WHERE (request = 'Fetch') SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET scrapedTargetName LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000
SELECT latest(kafka_network_requestmetrics_responsesendtimems) FROM Metric WHERE (request = 'Fetch') SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET scrapedTargetName LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000
SELECT latest(kafka_network_requestmetrics_requestqueuetimems) FROM Metric WHERE (request = 'FetchFollower') SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET scrapedTargetName LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000
SELECT latest(kafka_network_requestmetrics_localtimems) FROM Metric WHERE (request = 'FetchFollower') SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET scrapedTargetName LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000
SELECT latest(kafka_network_requestmetrics_remotetimems) FROM Metric WHERE (request = 'FetchFollower') SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET scrapedTargetName LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000
SELECT latest(kafka_network_requestmetrics_responsequeuetimems) FROM Metric WHERE (request = 'FetchFollower') SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET scrapedTargetName LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000
SELECT latest(kafka_network_requestmetrics_responsesendtimems) FROM Metric WHERE (request = 'FetchFollower') SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET scrapedTargetName LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 30000
